SELECT
FROM house_resource WHERE estate_type = 10 AND city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY sticky,create_time LIMIT 0,5

SELECT
FROM house_resource WHERE estate_type = 2 AND city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 0,5

SELECT
FROM house_resource WHERE estate_type = 11 AND city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY sticky,create_time LIMIT 0,5

select
from house_resource where sign_label = #{signLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: id, estate_type, longitude, latitude, average_price, monthly_rent, plot_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from house_resource
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM house_resource WHERE record_status = 0
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM house_resource WHERE sticky = 1 AND sell_status = 0 AND estate_type = #{estateType, jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT * FROM house_resource WHERE sticky_time = (SELECT MIN(sticky_time) FROM house_resource WHERE sticky = 1);
SELECT * FROM house_resource WHERE broker_id = #{brokerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM house_resource WHERE estate_type = #{estateType,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND sell_status = 0 AND sticky = 1 ORDER BY sticky_time DESC LIMIT 3) AS temp ORDER BY temp.sticky_time ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM house_resource WHERE estate_type = #{estateType,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND sell_status = 0 AND sticky = 1 ORDER BY sticky_time DESC LIMIT 5) AS temp ORDER BY temp.sticky_time ASC
